meanings.definition: The act of spending the weekend.
meanings.sent1: Weekending is a time to relax and unwind after a busy week.
meanings.sent2: I always look forward to weekending with my family at the beach.
meanings.sent3: During weekending, I like to binge-watch my favorite TV shows.
meanings.sent4: To me, weekending feels like a mini-vacation from work.
meanings.sent5: The joy of weekending is in taking a break from the daily routine.

meanings.definition: The time period from Friday evening to Sunday evening.
meanings.sent1: We usually plan our activities for weekending on Thursday night.
meanings.sent2: Weekending is when I catch up on my hobbies and spend time with friends.
meanings.sent3: Last weekending, we had a fun barbecue party in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The anticipation of weekending often makes the workweek more bearable.
meanings.sent5: The best part of weekending is enjoying a leisurely breakfast on Saturday morning.
